frontMatter.title: Thursday Badminton Fun!
frontMatter.summary: Join us at Claremont Stadium for Beginner Club Night from 9pm to 11pm. Open to all skill levels with courts for team games and open play.

prev.summary: Join us for our first home match of the new season. Exciting matches await with Navan 'A' vs Skryne starting at 8pm. Come and cheer for our team!
